languages.text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.
languages.original_text: Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}. Эта прибавка к броне уменьшается на значение истончения {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}завесы{/g} (не более чем до 0) и увеличивается на значение насыщения используемого посоха навигатора.

traits.locale_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% armour. This additional armour is reduced by the veil degradation amount (to a minimum of +0%), and increased by the infusing of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% armour. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of veil degradation (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the infusing of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

traits.locale_text: Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +10% к броне. Эта прибавка к броне уменьшается на значение истончения завесы (не более чем до 0) и увеличивается на значение насыщения используемого посоха навигатора.

Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +10% к броне. Эта прибавка к броне уменьшается на значение истончения завесы (не более чем до 0) и увеличивается на значение насыщения используемого посоха навигатора.

languages.text: 被导航者力量影响的盟友获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。此护甲加成会随着{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}而降低（最低降至0%），但也会随着导航者当前装备法杖的{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}属性提高。
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

traits.locale_text: 被导航者力量影响的盟友获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。此护甲加成会随着{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}而降低（最低降至0%），但也会随着导航者当前装备法杖的{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}属性提高。

languages.text: Los aliados seleccionados como objetivos del poder del navegante ganan un +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. Esta armadura adicional se ve reducida por la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} (hasta un mínimo de +0 %) y se ve incrementada por el parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} del báculo que tenga equipado actualmente el navegante.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados seleccionados como objetivos del poder del navegante ganan un +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. Esta armadura adicional se ve reducida por la degradación del velo (hasta un mínimo de +0 %) y se ve incrementada por el parámetro infusor del báculo que tenga equipado actualmente el navegante.

languages.text: Verbündete, die mit der Kraft des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Diese zusätzliche Rüstung wird um den Grad des {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfalls des Schleiers{/g} verringert (bis zu einem Minimum von +0 %) und abhängig von dem {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g}-Parameter des aktuell ausgerüsteten Navigatorstabs erhöht.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete, die mit der Kraft des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Diese zusätzliche Rüstung wird um den Grad des Zerfalls des Schleiers verringert (bis zu einem Minimum von +0%) und abhängig von der Durchdringung des aktuell ausgerüsteten Navigatorstabs erhöht.

languages.text: Les alliés ciblés par le pouvoir du navigateur bénéficient de +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}. La valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} réduit cette armure supplémentaire (+0 % minimum) tandis que l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} du bâton dont le navigateur est actuellement équipé l'augmente.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés ciblés par le pouvoir du Navigateur bénéficient de +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}. La valeur de Dégradation du Voile réduit cette armure supplémentaire (+0 % minimum) tandis que l'effet Infusion du bâton dont le Navigateur est actuellement équipé l'augmente.

languages.text: 航宙士の力のターゲットになった味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+10%増加する。この追加アーマーは{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}値に応じて減少（最低+0%）し、航宙士が現在装備している杖のパラメーターを{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}能力で増加する。
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の力のターゲットになった味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+10%増加する。この追加アーマーは{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}値に応じて減少（最低+0%）し、航宙士が現在装備している杖のパラメーターを{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}能力で増加する。

languages.text: Rotacı gücünün hedef aldığı tüm dost birimler, +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanırlar. {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Örtü bozulması{/g} miktarı bu ilave zırh değerini azaltırken (minimum +%0'a kadar), o an kullanılmakta olan Rotacı asasının {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}aşılayıcı{/g} parametresi ise tam aksine artırır.
languages.original_text: Allies that are targeted by the Navigator's power gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. This additional armour is reduced by the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} (to a minimum of +0%) and increased by the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter of the currently equipped Navigator's staff.
